_documentation.version_control: This field tracks the version of the assessment template
_documentation.structure_overview: This template defines the structure for all assessments in the system

question_rules.scoring: Scores must range from 1-5, where 1 is most positive
question_rules.categories: Each question must have a category and contribute to primaryCategory

recommendation_rules.levels: Must include: very-high, high, medium, low, very-low
recommendation_rules.format: Use lowercase with hyphens for all recommendation levels

threshold_rules.labels: Must use consistent labels: very-high, high, medium, low, very-low
threshold_rules.displayText: Each threshold must have a user-friendly displayText

specific_recommendations.title: Must be 'Specific Recommendations'
specific_recommendations.icon: Must be a valid icon name

general_recommendations.title: Must be 'General Recommendations'
general_recommendations.icon: Must be a valid icon name

naming.categories: Use Title Case for category names (e.g., 'Stress Management')
naming.recommendations: Use lowercase with hyphens for recommendation levels
naming.results_sections: Use consistent titles: 'Specific Recommendations' and 'General Recommendations'

content.options: Ensure options are mutually exclusive and cover the full range
content.results_sections: Keep section titles consistent across all assessments

scoring.consistency: Maintain consistent scoring across all questions
scoring.direction: 1 is always the most positive/desired response
scoring.categories: Each question should contribute to both its category and primaryCategory

common_pitfalls: Don't mix case styles in recommendation levels
Ensure all placeholder text is replaced

complete_question.text: How do your leaders typically respond to unexpected changes or disruptions?

options.text: Often resist change and struggle to adapt plans
Accept change reluctantly but have difficulty adjusting strategies
Adapt to change adequately but could improve flexibility
Generally embrace change and adjust plans accordingly
View change as opportunity and quickly pivot strategies when needed

base: Focus on developing an agile mindset before implementing specific practices
Build a culture of psychological safety to enable experimentation
Ensure leaders model the behaviors they wish to see in their teams
very-high: Implement a comprehensive agile leadership development program
Establish regular leadership retrospectives to drive continuous improvement
Create clear metrics for measuring leadership effectiveness in agility
Partner leaders with agile coaches for personalized development

needLevel.label: very-high
needLevel.displayText: There is a very high chance your team could benefit from agile leadership training

needLevel.label: high
needLevel.displayText: There is a high chance your team could benefit from agile leadership training

scorecardInfo.title: Agile Leadership Metrics
scorecardInfo.shortDescription: Evaluate your organization's agile leadership capabilities and identify improvement opportunities

update_instructions.new_scorecard: 1. Copy the complete_scorecard example. 2. Update all fields with your specific values. 3. Ensure the id is unique and in kebab-case. 4. Add the scorecard to the scorecards array.
update_instructions.update_scorecard: 1. Locate the existing scorecard in the scorecards array. 2. Update the relevant fields while maintaining the structure. 3. Ensure all required fields are present. 4. Verify the id remains unchanged.
update_instructions.validation: After creating or updating a scorecard, verify: 1. All required fields are present. 2. The id is unique and properly formatted. 3. The title and category use Title Case. 4. The visibility field is a boolean.

test_sync: This field should be added to all JSONs
_setup_instructions: IMPORTANT SETUP INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Replace all placeholder values marked with ${...}. 2. For each question in your assessment, add a corresponding category in questionRecommendations. 3. Ensure primaryCategory is set to your main scoring category. 4. Use the question's category name exactly as it appears in the questions section. 5. Each question should contribute to both its own category score and the primaryCategory score. 6. The paths in nextRoute should include the assessment ID (e.g., '/survey/your-assessment-id'). 7. Remove this _setup_instructions field when done.
_question_standardization: QUESTION STANDARDIZATION RULES: 1. All assessments must have exactly 12 questions. 2. All questions must be in English. 3. Question scoring follows this pattern: a) Each question has 5 options. b) Options are scored from 1 to 5, where 1 is the most positive/desired response and 5 is the least positive/desired response. c) Each option contributes to both its specific category score and the primaryCategory score. d) The scoring should be consistent across all questions in the assessment.

intro.title: Team Performance Metrics Assessment
intro.subtitle: Evaluate your team's performance across key metrics and identify areas for improvement

instructions.title: How to Complete This Assessment
steps: Answer each question based on observable team behaviors
Consider patterns across recent team performance
Focus on measurable outcomes and team dynamics
Select the option that best reflects current team performance

columns.title: Performance Framework
columns.content: Measuring and improving team effectiveness through data-driven insights

points.description: How effectively the team meets objectives
Quality of team interaction and cooperation
Team's ability to learn and adapt

intro.consentText: I understand this assessment will help identify areas for team performance improvement

items.text: How often do team members actively promote the company to others?

options.text: Never - team members avoid discussing the company
Always - actively promote the company as a great place to work

items.text: How well do team members understand and align with company goals?

options.text: Not at all - unclear about company direction
Well - clear understanding of goals and strategy
Extremely well - actively contribute to goal achievement

items.text: How often do team members demonstrate company values in their work?

options.text: Rarely - values are not evident in daily work
Always - values are deeply embedded in all work

items.text: How engaged are team members in company initiatives?

options.text: Not engaged - minimal participation in initiatives
Moderately engaged - participate in most initiatives
Highly engaged - actively participate and contribute
Extremely engaged - lead and champion initiatives

items.text: How effective is team communication in daily operations?
How well does the team balance workload and personal needs?
How effectively does the team work together on projects?
How well does the team handle and resolve conflicts?

options.text: Excellent - conflicts lead to positive outcomes

items.text: How consistently does the team meet performance targets?
How effectively does the team track and measure progress?
How effectively does the team learn from mistakes?
How well does the team adapt to changes and challenges?

_scoring_notes.primaryCategory: This is the main category used for overall assessment scoring
_scoring_notes.recommendations: Recommendations are organized by need level
_scoring_notes.thresholds: Thresholds determine the recommendation level based on scores
_scoring_notes.results_sections: Keep section titles consistent: 'Specific Recommendations' and 'General Recommendations'

base: Establish clear performance expectations and goals for all team members
Implement regular check-ins to discuss progress and provide feedback
Create a system for recognizing and celebrating team achievements
very-high: Develop a comprehensive team performance framework with balanced metrics
Implement structured team performance reviews with specific action planning
Create a performance dashboard to track key metrics and provide transparency
Establish clear accountability mechanisms and performance consequences
high: Conduct a team performance workshop to identify key barriers and enablers
Implement regular structured feedback sessions for all team members
Develop focused improvement plans for underperforming areas
Align individual goals with team performance metrics
medium: Refine existing performance measurement approaches for better accuracy
Enhance communication around performance expectations and current results
Implement targeted coaching for specific performance improvement areas
Create better connections between performance metrics and business outcomes
low: Fine-tune your performance management system to optimize team results
Develop advanced performance coaching capabilities for team leaders
Create mechanisms for sharing performance best practices across teams
very-low: Establish your team as a performance model for the rest of the organization
Create systems to sustain high performance during periods of change

team_performance.title: Overall Team Performance
team_performance.description: Comprehensive analysis of team effectiveness and productivity

high: Significant gaps in team performance metrics
Key performance indicators below target levels
medium: Some areas meeting targets, others needing improvement
low: Most key metrics meeting or exceeding targets

high: Establish clear metrics and tracking systems

report_structure.title: Team Performance Development Plan
report_structure.description: Based on your team's performance assessment, we've created a comprehensive development plan focused on enhancing team effectiveness:

critical_focus.title: Priority Focus Areas
critical_focus.description: These areas require immediate attention for improvement

development_opportunities.title: Development Opportunities
development_opportunities.description: These areas present opportunities for improvement

implementation_strategy.title: Implementation Strategy
implementation_strategy.description: A structured approach to improving team performance
recommendations: Performance Assessment: Conduct comprehensive team performance review
Goal Setting: Establish clear, measurable performance objectives
Action Planning: Develop specific improvement initiatives
Progress Tracking: Implement regular performance monitoring
Continuous Improvement: Establish feedback and adjustment mechanisms

support_resources.description: Tools and resources to support performance improvement

summaries.text: Your team shows significant opportunities for performance improvement across key metrics.
Your team's performance indicates several areas requiring focused improvement efforts.
Your team demonstrates moderate performance with specific areas for enhancement.
Your team shows good performance with opportunities for optimization.
Your team demonstrates strong performance across most metrics.

thankYou.title: Thank You for Completing the Team Performance Assessment!
thankYou.message: We've analyzed your team's performance across key metrics and will provide targeted recommendations for improvement.
thankYou.nextSteps: We'll provide detailed insights and actionable recommendations based on your assessment. A performance specialist may contact you to discuss improvement strategies.

scorecardInfo.title: Conflict Views
scorecardInfo.shortDescription: Evaluate if your team would benefit from conflict resolution training and mediation techniques
